actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exempt certain automotive parts and accessories from the excise tax imposed by section 4061 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

summary.text: Exempts additional automotive parts and accessories on vehicles having a gross vehicle weight of 10,000 pounds or less from the excise tax imposed under the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.

titles.title: A bill to exempt certain automotive parts and accessories from the excise tax imposed by section 4061 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954.
